conditions.name: On achievement list success
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'List achievements' action if the list received successfully.

conditions.name: On achievement list fail
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'List achievements' action if the request failed.

conditions.name: Compare achievement state
conditions.description: Test if an achievement at an index is hidden, revealed or unlocked.

params.name: State
params.description: The state of the achievement to test.

conditions.name: On achievement metadata success
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'Get metadata' action if the data received successfully.

conditions.name: On achievement metadata fail
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'Get metadata' action if the request failed.

conditions.name: On achievement revealed
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Reveal' when the achievement has been successfully revealed.

params.name: Achievement ID
params.description: ID of the achievement that was revealed.

conditions.name: On achievement unlocked
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Unlock' or when an incremental achievement's steps have been fulfilled.

params.name: Achievement ID
params.description: ID of the achievement that was unlocked.

conditions.name: Is loaded
conditions.description: True if 'On loaded' has fired and the plugin is ready to use.

conditions.name: On signed in
conditions.description: Triggered when the user successfully signs in.

conditions.name: Is signed in
conditions.description: True if the user is currently signed in.

conditions.name: On error
conditions.description: Triggered if an error occurs in the game services.

conditions.name: On player details received
conditions.description: Triggered after 'Request player details', when the response has been received.

conditions.name: On signed out
conditions.description: Triggered when the user signs out.

conditions.name: On auto-sign in failed
conditions.description: Triggered on startup if the user could not be automatically logged in. It will be necessary to use the 'Sign in' action.

conditions.name: On score submit success
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'Submit score' action if the score was submitted successfully.

conditions.name: On score submit fail
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'Submit score' action if the score failed to submitted successfully.

conditions.name: On hi-score request success
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'Request hi-scores' action if the scores were received successfully.

conditions.name: On hi-score request fail
conditions.description: Triggered after a 'Request hi-scores' action if the request failed.

conditions.name: On sign in failed
conditions.description: Triggered when the user did not sign in. This might be because the user cancelled or due to an error.

actions.name: List achievements
actions.description: Request a list of achievements for the current player.
actions.display_text: Request list of {0} achievements. Force reload: {1}

params.name: Which
params.description: Which achievements to request a list of.

params.name: Force reload
params.description: Ensure that the results are up to date, and not from the cache.

actions.name: Get metadata
actions.description: Request achievements metadata (name, description etc.) allowing the corresponding expressions to return the correct values.

params.name: Force reload
params.description: Ensure that the results are up to date, and not from the cache.

actions.name: Increment
actions.description: Add steps to an incremental achievement.

params.name: Steps
params.description: Number of steps to increment the achievement by.

actions.name: Set steps
actions.description: Set the steps progress of an incremental achievement.

params.name: Steps
params.description: Number of steps to set the achievement progress to. The steps cannot be reduced.

actions.name: Request player details
actions.description: If signed in, request the details of the signed in player.

actions.name: Sign in
actions.description: Request the player to sign in.

actions.name: Sign out
actions.description: Sign out if already signed in. NOTE: not supported in Android apps.

actions.name: Submit score
actions.description: Submit a score to a leaderboard.

params.name: Leaderboard ID
params.description: Leaderboard ID to submit the score to.

params.name: Score
params.description: The score to submit to the leaderboard.

params.name: Tag
params.description: Up to 64 extra characters to submit along with this score.

actions.name: Request hi-scores
actions.description: Request a list of scores from a leaderboard.
actions.display_text: Request {1} {2} hi-scores from [b]{0}[/b] ([i]{3}[/i] results, [i]{4}[/i]). Force reload: {5}

params.name: Leaderboard ID
params.description: Leaderboard ID to request scores from.

params.name: Collection
params.description: Whether to return all scores, or scores relating to the current player.

params.name: Time span
params.description: Return the top scores in the given time span.

params.name: Results
params.description: The number of score results to return, from 1 to 25.

params.name: Type
params.description: Return the top scores, or a window of the scores around the current player's best score.

params.name: Force reload
params.description: Ensure that the results are up to date, and not from the cache.

actions.name: Show native leaderboard dialog
actions.description: Display the native google play games dialog for a specific leaderboard (only works in Android app).

actions.name: Show native leaderboards dialog
actions.description: Display the native google play games dialog for all leaderboards (only works in Android app).

actions.name: Show native achievements dialog
actions.description: Display the native google play games dialog for all achievements (only works in Android app).

expressions.name: AchievementsCount
expressions.description: The number of returned achievements in the list.

expressions.name: AchievementIDAt
expressions.description: The ID of an achievement at an index.

expressions.name: AchievementStepsAt
expressions.description: The current steps for an incremental achievement at an index.

expressions.name: AchievementNameAt
expressions.description: The metadata name of an achievement at an index.

expressions.name: AchievementDescriptionAt
expressions.description: The metadata description of an achievement at an index.

expressions.name: AchievementTypeAt
expressions.description: The metadata type ("standard" or "incremental") of an achievement at an index.

expressions.name: AchievementTotalStepsAt
expressions.description: The metadata total steps of an incremental achievement at an index.

expressions.name: AchievementRevealedIconURLAt
expressions.description: The metadata icon image URL of a revealed achievement at an index.

expressions.name: AchievementUnlockedIconURLAt
expressions.description: The metadata icon image URL of an unlocked achievement at an index.

expressions.name: ErrorMessage
expressions.description: In 'On error', return the error message if available.

expressions.name: HiScoreTotalCount
expressions.description: The total number of scores in the leaderboard.

expressions.name: HiScoreMyBest
expressions.description: The current player's best score on the returned leaderboard.

expressions.name: HiScoreMyBestTag
expressions.description: The tag for the current player's best score.

expressions.name: HiScoreCount
expressions.description: The number of scores returned for the current page.

expressions.name: HiScoreNameAt
expressions.description: Player name at an index in the returned page.

expressions.name: HiScoreRankAt
expressions.description: Score rank at an index in the returned page.

expressions.name: HiScoreAt
expressions.description: Score value at an index in the returned page.

expressions.name: HiScoreTagAt
expressions.description: Score tag at an index in the returned page.

expressions.name: HiScoreFormattedAt
expressions.description: Formatted score value at an index in the returned page.

expressions.name: HiScoreFormattedRankAt
expressions.description: Formatted score rank (e.g. "1st") at an index in the returned page.

expressions.name: HiScoreMyFormattedBest
expressions.description: The formatted version of the current player's best score.

expressions.name: HiScoreMyBestRank
expressions.description: The rank of the current player's best score.

expressions.name: HiScoreMyBestFormattedRank
expressions.description: The formatted rank (e.g. "1st") of the current player's best score.

expressions.name: MyID
expressions.description: The ID of the signed in player.

expressions.name: MyDisplayName
expressions.description: The display name of the signed in player.

expressions.name: MyAvatarURL
expressions.description: The URL to the avatar image of the signed in player.

expressions.name: MyGivenName
expressions.description: The given name of the signed in player.

expressions.name: MyFamilyName
expressions.description: The family name of the signed in player.
